<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PmDebugUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PmDebugUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PmDebugUtil = Class.create();
PmDebugUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'PmDebugUtil'
};

PmDebugUtil.logMsg = function(type, message) {
    if(gs.getProperty(PmFieldConstants.DEBUG_ENABLE) == 'true' || 
        GlideSessionDebug.isDebugging("log")) {
        gs.info( '[' + type + ']: ' + message );
    }
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-02-18 15:05:37</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>97469af19f523100598a5bb0657fcf23</sys_id>

        <sys_name>PmDebugUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">e93557642fc10110d8a4d5f62799b623</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
